TopicTitle: Old time user joining in on the 1.0 hype.

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Been playing Kerbal Space Program for a few years now so I thought that it would be a good time to join in now with the recent release of 1.0!

I have been lurking around here for a while and I think that I can already say that this is a great forum.

Fun and not so safe journeys everyone!

Hello! and welcome to the forums!

Yes, the recent release has made this forum explode with new people.

Greetings!

I hope your time here is enjoable.
